enhanced_description: Mettl, a Mercer company, is a global leader in talent assessment since 2010. It serves over 4000 corporates, 31 government departments, and 500 educational institutions across 80+ countries. Mettl provides an all-in-one cloud-based assessment platform leveraging research-backed evaluations, analytics, and best-in-class AI-based proctoring with cheating prevention protocols. The platform offers customizable and scalable solutions capable of conducting over 200,000 proctored assessments daily, designed to support credible people decisions in acquisition and development for hiring, skills assessment, training, employee development, and certification exams.
